constituent: witch, hemp, cliff, grove, tree, wood, ghost, oni, drop, brains, rice field, human legs, elbow, tree2, wood2
heisigStory: Hemp . . . ghost. Take care not to confuse with the primitive of the same name we learned earlier (Frame 458).
koohiiStory1: This modern version of the witch lives in some hippie community. She smokes a lot of hemp, and spends the day talking to ghosts, which not surprisingly appears only to her.
koohiiStory2: The witch sold me some hemp that made me see ghosts don´t do drugs.
words: to deceive, to falsify, to misrepresent
